content:
# EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Electricity generator at position (117.5, -30.5)
Consists of steam engine (position (117.5, -30.5)), boiler (position (111.5, -32.0)), and offshore pump (position (107.5, -33.5)) connected by pipes.

### Copper plate mine at position (62.0, -54.0)
Consists of a furnace (position (62.0, -54.0)) with no ingredients to smelt.

### Water supply system at position (107.5, -34.5)
Consists of an offshore pump (position (107.5, -33.5)) and a pipe group (fluid system 121407) with multiple pipes.

### Steam supply system at position (117.5, -34.5)
Consists of a boiler (position (111.5, -32.0)) and a pipe group (fluid system 121411) with multiple pipes.

### Electricity distribution system at position (119.5, -30.5)
Consists of a small electric pole (position (119.5, -30.5)) with an electricity group (id 574898) and voltage 0.

### Belt system at positions (63.5, -53.5) and (64.5, -53.5)
Consists of two belts with direction UP.

# ERROR TIPS
* Errors when inserting coal into the boiler: Ensure you have coal in your inventory before attempting to insert it into the boiler.
* Errors when the boiler is out of fuel: Ensure the boiler has a sufficient fuel supply to operate.
* Errors when the steam engine has no input liquid: Ensure the steam engine is connected to a pipe with a fluid supply.
* Errors when the furnace has no ingredients to smelt: Ensure the furnace has the necessary ingredients to smelt.

# NAMESPACE
* No utility functions have been defined by the agent.
* Important variables:
  + transport-belt: 8
  + small-electric-pole: 1
  + wood: 7
  + iron-ore: 10
  + copper-ore: 10
  + iron-plate: 7
  + copper-plate: 5
  + copper-cable: 2
  + iron-gear-wheel: 2
